articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Ninth Congress of Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Ninth Congress of Youth League
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 When he appeared at the photographing venue, stormy cheers "hurrah!" burst forth.
					
					 He extended warm salute to the enthusiastically cheering participants.
					
					 Young man and woman, on behalf of the participants in the congress, presented bunches of flowers to him in reflection of boundless reverence and best wishes of all youth across the country for him.
					
					 He once again warmly congratulated the participants and had a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed belief that all the participants in the congress would develop the youth league into the eternal youth league of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under the uplifted banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and successfully perform their mission and duty as reserves, advance force and wing of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the van of creating the Mallima speed for carrying out the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Su Gil, Kim Nung O, Pak Thae Song and Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, Kim Yong Ju, head of a delegation of the Korean Youth League in Japan, and Kim Yong Nyo, head of a delegation of Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, on Aug. 23.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade
					
					 I express my gratitude to you for extending warm congratulations to me on my 85th birthday.
					
					 I pay the highest homage to you.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Italian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Italian Delegation
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by a delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday by head of the delegation Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Sy El Hadji Amadou Gueye, secretary general of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Italian Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Italian Delegation
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday met and had a talk with a delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy headed by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Malaysian King
articles.content:
Greetings to Malaysian King
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Al－Sultan Almutasimu Billahi Muhibbudin Tuanku Alhaj Abdul Halim Muadzam Shah Ibni Al－Marhum Sultan Badlishah, king of Malaysia, on Aug. 31 on its national day.
					 The message wished the Malaysian people progress and prosperity, expressing belief that the long-standing traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Greetings to Malaysian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Malaysian Prime Minister
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greetings to Datuk Seri Mohamad Najib Bin Tun Haji Abudul Razak, prime minister of Malaysia, on Wednesday on its national day.
					 The message wished the Malaysian prime minister and his government success in the work for the national stability and development, expressing the belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations would grow stronger in accordance with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of greeting to his Malaysian counterpart Datuk Anifah Aman on the same day.

articles.title: Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Sy El Hadji Amadou Gueye, secretary general of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and his party Wednesday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and careers of his family members, the guests looked round the historic relics preserved at his old home with much care.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-tech Complex on the same day.

articles.title: Participants of Youth League Congress Tour Sci-Tech Complex
articles.content:
Participants of Youth League Congress Tour Sci-Tech Complex
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The participants of the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League toured the Sci-Tech Complex.
					 They paid tribute to the art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at its lobby.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact the complex was successfully built as an icon study centre for all people in the new century under the energetic leadership and deep care of Marshal Kim Jong Un, they looked round its various parts.
					
					 They also watched newly produced Korean film "Story about My House" in cinemas.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works," Vol. 14 Published in DPRK
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works," Vol. 14 Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works," Vol. 14 was published in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 93 works including talks, speeches and concluding speeches made by leader Kim Jong Il in the period from May to December, Juche 59 (1970).
					
					 The works clarify the issues which serve as guidelines for the workers in the field of film art in living up with loyalty to the deep political trust and care of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The works set forth the tasks of the all party officials to bring about a revolutionary turn in work method and style including the issue of evaluating people with their loyalty to the President and ability and their present life as main criteria and doing the work with people prudently with a warm human touch.
					
					 They also give answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the Juche-based construction of literature and arts including the need for the creators and artistes in the field of literature and arts to choose the matters of social significance as seeds and make profound portrayal of people's course of revolutionization and successfully applying the method of creating socialist realism in the creation of works. 
					
					 It also contains works dealing with the idea that the service personnel should train their physical bodies and intensify training, acquire marksmanship of never missing targets and thus honorably fulfill the sacred duty for defending the country.
					
					 There are in the book works indicating tasks and ways of rapidly developing the nation's sports including the need for the sports field to firmly establish the Party's unitary ideological system and training lots of promising players.
					
					 Contained in the book are works giving answers to practical issues arising in socialist construction including the issue of giving wide publicity to the feats of the President, the issue of turning the youth organizations into viable and militant organizations and the issue of properly preserving historical and cultural relics.

articles.title: National Workshop on Application Effect of Conservation Agriculture Held
articles.content:
National Workshop on Application Effect of Conservation Agriculture Held
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The National Workshop on Application Effect of the Conservation Agriculture in the DPRK was held at the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science on Aug. 30 and 31.
					 Present there were officials and researchers of the Academy of Agricultural Science, ministries, national institutions, scientific research and education institutes and other relevant fields and the Swedish ambassador to the DPRK, the UN resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative in the DPRK and other staff members of the missions of the international organizations such as the European Union Programme Support.
					
					 The speakers said introducing the conservation agriculture has become a current world trend to improve the agricultural and ecological environment and increase the agricultural production.
					
					 They expressed belief that the national workshop would mark a significant occasion in discussing the successes and experience gained in the studies of conservation agriculture and its application.
					
					 They explained the issues of protecting land and making the best use of it in putting the agricultural production on a scientific and intensive basis.

articles.title: Sariwon Youth Stadium Renovated in DPRK
articles.content:
Sariwon Youth Stadium Renovated in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Sariwon Youth Stadium in North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK has been successfully renovated on a modern basis.
					The 22,000-seat stadium has a football field with synthetic grass, volleyball and basketball courts and a running track with rubber carpet.
					
					 The stadium, ready to host international games, will be conducive to developing the nation's sporting techniques and mass sports.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un acquainted himself with its renovation some time ago and saw to it that the stadium was named the Sariwon Youth Stadium.

articles.title: DPRK Workers Flail Traitor Park's Remarks over SLBM Test-fire
articles.content:
DPRK Workers Flail Traitor Park's Remarks over SLBM Test-fire
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea has persistently pulled up the DPRK over its successful test-fire of strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile.
					 Dazed by the news of the test-fire, Park rushed to a frontline unit of the south Korean puppet army and called for a "strong counteraction", prattling that the "nuclear and missile threats are coming from the north hour by hour."
					
					 Such moves are now arousing a surging wrath from among the DPRK citizens including workers. 
					
					 Her behavior reminds one of a rabid dog running wild, Jang Chol Ryong, crew head of a furnace at the steel workshop of the Chollima Steel Complex, said, adding:
					
					 Park is patently a mad woman with abnormal cogitation and disposition.
					
					 Whenever the DPRK's might is fully displayed, she would throw mud at it without any consideration. 
					
					 Park brought the Korean Peninsula into a touch-and-go situation by staging the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises in south Korea with outside forces. Such being the case, she criticizes the DPRK's just steps for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent as a "threat", like a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 Park, a living corpse, had better stop wagging her tongue and leave this world.

articles.title: DPRK, Full-fledged Space Power
articles.content:
DPRK, Full-fledged Space Power
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- In August Juche 87 (1998) Kwangmyongsong-1, the first earth satellite of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, was successfully launched into space.
					 Its manufacture and successful launch was a result of the devoted efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il to display the national strength.
					
					 The leader had wisely guided the work to develop the satellite, a complex of ultra-modern science and technology, in reliance upon the nation's efforts, technology and resources.
					
					 He organized a research group with able scientists and technicians and indicated in detail the matters related to the development of satellite.
					
					 Under his deep care, the group could manufacture the country's first satellite with 100 percent domestic technology and efforts and succeed in putting it into the set orbit at one launch.
					
					 When the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 was launched, too, Kim Jong Il visited the satellite control centre to watch the process of its launch together with space scientists and technicians.
					
					 He said with satisfaction that the U.S. imperialists and its followers threatened to intercept the satellite launch, but the DPRK successfully launched Kwangmyongsong-2 into orbit with its firm independent stand.
					
					 The successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-2 rocked the whole world in an instant. Media of 100-odd countries highlighted this news.
					
					 The DPRK's tremendous strength as a space power has been further demonstrated to the full under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It launched a sci-tech satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 in December 2012 and an earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 in February 2016 under the 2016 plan of the 5-year plan for national aerospace development.
					
					 The launches marked a milestone in developing the nation's science and technology, economy and defence capabilities.
					
					 The National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK declared that it would launch more satellites of Juche into space, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of attaching importance to science and technology.

articles.title: Social Scientific Seminar on U.S. Aggressor Ship General Sherman Held
articles.content:
Social Scientific Seminar on U.S. Aggressor Ship General Sherman Held
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- There took place at the Sci-Tech Complex Wednesday a social scientific seminar to mark the 150th anniversary of the sinking of the U.S. aggressor ship General Sherman.
					 It was attended by officials, teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists and editors in the fields of science, education, media and preservation of revolutionary relics and national heritages.
					
					 Explaining in detail how the U.S. aggressor ship General Sherman intruded into Korea in 1866, speakers said that the intrusion of the ship was a brigandish invasion of Korea.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The patriotic and self-sacrificing struggle waged by service personnel and civilians of the walled city of Pyongyang to sink the ship recorded a shining page in the modern history as a struggle through which the Korean people beat back the U.S. first invasion of Korea.
					
					 The intrusion of General Sherman was a prelude to the history of the U.S. imperialists' invasion of Korea. The U.S. imperialists' invasion of Korea and the struggle of the Korean people against it and the confrontation between Korea and the U.S. have continued for the last 150 years.
					
					 The history of this confrontation can be characterized by the ever-victorious history of the Korean people and the history in which the U.S. imperialists sustained repeated defeats.
					
					 It is impossible to expect peace on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy towards the DPRK to establish military control over the whole of Korea and seize hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Speakers demanded the U.S. immediately respond to the DPRK's fair and aboveboard proposal for replacing the armistice agreement with a peace treaty and withdraw its forces and nuclear weapons from south Korea.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Odd Burlesque between Nuclear War Maniacs
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Odd Burlesque between Nuclear War Maniacs
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- An odd burlesque is now under way between the American master and his stooge over the issue of the U.S. "preemptive nuclear attack".
					 The U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state and nuclear criminal, is talking about " no-first use of nuclear weapons" while the south Korean puppet forces are eagerly asking their master to retract it, clinging to his coattails. 
					
					 This is another hypocritical farce and an unpardonable challenge to the Korean nation and mankind aspiring after peace and stability.
					
					 As well known to everybody, the U.S. is the war state which regards nuclear weapons as a main means for carrying out its strategy of hegemony and preemptive nuclear attack as an invariable doctrine of aggression and the nuclear criminal state which brought the first nuclear disaster to mankind.
					
					 After dropping A bombs without hesitation over the heads of Japanese people in the closing period of World War II in a bid to implement its strategy to dominate the world, the U.S. worked out a plan for using nuclear weapons against the Korean nation during the Korean War and worked hard to put it into practice.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its scenario to stifle the DPRK with nuclear weapons still now. 
					
					 After singling out the DPRK as the target of its preemptive nuclear strike, the U.S. steadily rounded off its scenario for invading the DPRK through preemptive nuclear strike and has staged madcap nuclear war drills every year to implement it.
					
					 The Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces is pursuant to OPLAN 5015, scenario of preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK. Therefore, its danger has reached its height, sparking off great concern among the Koreans and people of regional countries.
					
					 While paying lip-service to "no-first use of nuclear weapons," the U.S. is openly staging such saber-rattling for preemptive nuclear attack as Ulji Freedom Guardian in a bid to wreck the regional peace and stability. This is the true colors of Washington.
					
					 It is quite natural for the world to denounce and curse it.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that traitor Park Geun Hye is taking the lead in helping the U.S. carry out its nuclear war strategy.
					
					 The Park group is making extra zeal to inflict the same nuclear disaster suffered by the Japanese people in the last century upon the compatriots. Therefore, the Park regime is the worst group of traitors in the nation's history and nuclear war servants keen to disturb peace and stability in the region.
					
					 The Koreans have been exposed to the danger of a nuclear war for the last several decades and regional peace and stability have been at serious peril owing to such nuclear maniacs.
					
					 Neither detente and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region nor global peace are thinkable as long as such nuclear war maniacs as the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are allowed to exist on this earth.
					
					 All Koreans should turn out in the sacred struggle to foil the reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for a nuclear war and the international community is required to be vigilant against the hypocrisy of the nuclear war maniacs.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily bolster up its nuclear force for self-defence, the treasured sword for preserving peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Zika Virus Case Reported in S. Korea
articles.content:
Zika Virus Case Reported in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- One more case infected with Zika virus was reported in south Korea, according to the south Korean MBC on Aug. 27.
					 A man in his sixties, upon his return home after making a foreign business trip, was diagnosed as being infected with Zika virus.
					
					 This was the 11th case reported in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean CBS Deplores Catastrophe Inside and Outside S. Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean CBS Deplores Catastrophe Inside and Outside S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- South Korea is now hit by a lot of troubles at home and abroad, according to the south Korean CBS on Aug. 29.
					 It noted that the economic growth rate has plummeted and the gap between the rich and the poor has widened, increasing disillusionment with the authorities as the days go by.
					
					 The political camp is preoccupied with the moves to maintain power by dint of all sorts of gimmicks rather than administering politics for the people, it said, and went on: 
					
					 The situation is little different from that more than 100 years back when Korea was deprived of sovereignty sandwiched among neighboring big powers. 
					
					 The situation in south Korea hit hard by a lot of troubles at home and abroad is similar to that 106 years ago when "the Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" was fabricated. 
					
					 CBS called on the Koreans not to disregard the present disgrace but to draw the historic lesson.

articles.title: S. Korean Victims of Sexual Slavery Sue Authorities for Damages
articles.content:
S. Korean Victims of Sexual Slavery Sue Authorities for Damages
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- 12 south Korean victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army on August 30 sued the puppet authorities for damage, according to Tongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Enraged by the authorities' act of establishing the "foundation for reconciliation and recovery" in the wake of the humiliating "agreement" made with Japan on the issue of sexual slavery and their decision to pay money given by Japan to victims, they staged such protest action.
					
					 They charged that the authorities inflicted mental and material damage on the victims of the sexual slavery through the "agreement" such as "final and irreversible solution" to the issue of the sexual slavery, restraint on accusation and criticism in the international community and settlement of the Japanese government's concern over the girl statue.
					
					 They declared they have held the Japanese government legally responsible for forcing them into the sexual slavery and will do so in the future, too.

articles.title: Move for Concealing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Slammed
articles.content:
Move for Concealing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Slammed
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A permanent member of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster on August 30 exposed the base attempt of the puppet Ministry of Marine Transport and Fishery to obstruct the probe into the truth about the disaster, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 He recalled that the ministry made a decision on separating the passenger cabins from the ferry Sewol hull under the pretext of retrieving the bodies still missing.
					
					 The ministry's proposed cutting off the ferry Sewol hull is little short of blocking a precision inquiry into the hull required for probing the truth about the disaster, he noted.
					
					 He underlined the need to discuss again from the beginning the proposal for investigation, adjustment and preservation after the salvage of the ferry Sewol hull.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slammed by Austrian Body
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slammed by Austrian Body
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria on Aug. 26 sent a letter to the U.S. Embassy in Vienna in protest against the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill being staged by the U.S. imperialists in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The letter said that the committee strongly denounces the military drill of the U.S. and south Korea and demanded an immediate halt to it.
					
					 The U.S. ceaseless joint military exercises on the Korean peninsula and around it can never be justified, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. actions pose a threat to the peace and security not only on the Korean peninsula but in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK immediately.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Slammed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Slammed in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), the Bangladesh People's League, the Bangladeshi preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee and the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy on Aug. 25 released a joint statement denouncing the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet war maniacs.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The said military drill, which the U.S. is staging with south Korea by mobilizing all kinds of nuclear strike means, is to invade the DPRK.
					
					 It shows that the U.S. plan for a pre-emptive nuclear attack on the DPRK has entered the reckless phase of practical implementation.
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. stop the military drill, which may trigger off a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula, and roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 We express full solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people loving peace.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Feats Lauded by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Feats Lauded by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted special write-ups on its website on August 17 and 22 on the Day of Songun.
					 An article titled "Eternal head" said that leader Kim Jong Il firmly guaranteed Songun politics by law, laying a framework for the prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 It detailed the fact that he turned the DPRK into a military power with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Another article titled "Day of Songun in DPRK" noted that the Korean People's Army grown to be an elite revolutionary army under the guidance of Kim Jong Il has won victory only in ceaseless confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The DPRK is getting invincible by dint of single-minded unity, strong with self-defense and prosperous with industrial revolution in the new century, the article said, adding this eye-opening reality in the DPRK would be unthinkable apart from Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His immortal Songun exploits will shine forever along with the Day of Songun in the DPRK, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Austrian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Austrian Body
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on its website on Aug. 26.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il during their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for devotedly defending and glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Songun Is All-powerful Treasured Sword of Korean Revolution: Mauritanian Media
articles.content:
Songun Is All-powerful Treasured Sword of Korean Revolution: Mauritanian Media
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Mauritanian media carried special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on August 25, the 56th anniversary of his start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 An internet newspaper in an article titled "Songun, all-powerful treasured sword of Korean revolution" said that Songun is the brilliant tradition of the Korean revolution, all-powerful treasured sword and banner of victory and glory.
					
					 It praised President Kim Il Sung, founder of Songun idea, for starting and advancing the Korean revolution with arms and creating heroic epic of winning one victory after another in confrontation with imperialists.
					
					 Songun was the unshakable revolutionary faith of Kim Jong Il, it noted, adding he made a long journey for Songun with an iron will to carry forward the Korean revolution with Songun.
					
					 Introducing the originality and vitality of his Songun politics in relation with the reality of the DPRK, it went on:
					
					 Songun is the treasured sword guaranteeing the DPRK's victory in confrontation with the U.S. and cornerstone ensuring happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying out the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection has boosted the national power in every way by advancing the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and ushered in a fresh heyday of Songun.
					
					 The Korean revolution will bring a final victory thanks to him.
					
					 Another internet newspaper and internet news reported the similar program.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in Nigeria, Angola
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in Nigeria, Angola
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Nigeria and Angola on August 23 and 24 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 They included a Korean book exhibition at the Bakura Farm of Zamfara State of Nigeria and a reading session and lecture by a company of Angola and the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples.
					
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were books introducing the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and the successes achieved by the servicepersons and people of the DPRK in the building of a socialist power.
					
					 The director of the Social Education Department of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said that the DPRK has honorably defended the sovereignty and dignity in the standoff with the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" in the world for a long period since Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The eye-opening reality in which the DPRK has achieved invincibility and prosperity with single-minded unity would be unthinkable without his Songun revolutionary leadership feats, the director noted, adding:
					
					 Though he passed away, the immortal revolutionary exploits he performed before the times and humankind with his unique Songun politics are shedding more brilliant rays thanks to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en IX Congreso de Union de la Juventud
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en IX Congreso de Union de la Juventud
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto con los participantes en el IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung. 
					Cuando Kim Jong Un salio al lugar de filmacion estallaron las aclamaciones tempestuosas "!Viva!".
					
					El Mariscal envio el saludo cordial con la mano alzada a los participantes que le daban efusivas aclamaciones.
					
					El Mariscal recibio los ramos de flores que en representacion de los participantes en el Congreso le ofrecian los jovenes de ambos sexos reflejando la gran veneracion de todos los jovenes del pais.
					
					Volvio a felicitar calurosamente a los participantes en el Congreso y se tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con ellos. 
					
					Y expreso la conviccion de que los participantes fortaleceran la Union de la Juventud como eterna organizacion de los grandes Lideres bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y cumpliran satisfactoriamente con su mision y deber del destacamento de reserva, patrulla y de flanco del PTC poniendose al frente de la creacion de la velocidad de Mallima para la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Su Gil, Kim Nung O, Pak Thae Song, el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC Ri Il Hwan, el primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Jon Yong Nam, el jefe de la delegacion de la Union de Jovenes Coreanos Residentes en Japon, Kim Yong Ju, y la jefa de la delegacion de la Asociacion de Jovenes Coreanos Residentes en China, Kim Yong Nyo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el mensaje de respuesta que le remitiera el dia 23 Raul Castro Ruz, Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Estimado companero:
					
					Le agradezco sus cordiales felicitaciones con motivo de mi 85 cumpleanos.
					
					Con mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de delegacion italiana de parlamentarios
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de delegacion italiana de parlamentarios
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Presidente Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le obsequiara la delegacion de parlamentarios de varios partidos politicos de Italia que esta de visita en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El secretario general de la Comision para los Asuntos Exteriores del Senado de Italia, Antonio Razzi, quien preside la delegacion, lo entrego este miercoles a Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Malasia
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este miercoles un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Malasia, Al-Sultan Almutasimu Billahi Muhibbudin Tuanku Alhaj Abdul Halim Muadzam Shah Ibni Al-Marhum Sultan Badlishah, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises que tienen larga tradicion historica se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses comunes, el remitente deseo el progreso y la prosperidad del pueblo malasio.

articles.title: ACNC comenta farsa de maniacos de guerra nuclear
articles.content:
ACNC comenta farsa de maniacos de guerra nuclear
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea estan orquestando una payasada en cuanto al problema de "ataque preventivo nuclear".
					EE.UU., mayor poseedor de armas nucleares del mundo y criminal nuclear, insiste en el "no uso de armas nucleares primero", mientras los titeres surcoreanos le solicitan retirarlo. 
					
					Esto es un engano e intolerable desafio a la nacion coreana y los demas del mundo que desean la paz y la estabilidad. 
					
					Como esta conocido por todos, EE.UU. es el pais belicoso y criminal nuclear que considera las armas nucleares como remedio principal para el cumplimiento de su estrategia hegemonica y el ataque preventivo nuclear como su invariable doctrina de agresion, y que dio por primera vez los desastres nucleares a la humanidad. 
					
					A fin de lograr su estrategia hegemonica lanzo sin vacilacion las bombas atomicas contra el pueblo japones en el periodo final de la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Y en la pasada guerra coreana trazo el plan de uso de armas nucleares contra la nacion coreana e hizo esfuerzos desesperados por llevarlo a efecto.
					
					La campana de aplastamiento nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC continua ininterrumpidamente hasta la fecha. 
					
					El imperio definio a este pais socialista como blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear y perfecciono constantemente los planes de agresion a la RPDC en forma de ataque preventivo nuclear y desarrolla cada ano los fanaticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear para ponerlos en practica. 
					
					Ahora, el simulacro conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian que el imperio desarrolla junto con los titeres surcoreanos esta basado en el "OPLAN 5015", plan de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC. Por esta razon, la peligrosidad y gravedad de este simulacro llegaron a la extremidad produciendo gran preocupacion de la nacion coreana y los paises regionales. 
					
					EE.UU. habla por una parte del "no uso de armas nucleares primero" y por la otra, despliega abiertamente los ejercicios belicos de ataque preventivo nuclear como UFG perturbando la paz y la estabilidad de la region, lo cual es precisamente la naturaleza del imperio yanqui.
					
					Es muy natural que EE.UU. se haga objeto de las censuras e indignaciones de todo el mundo. 
					
					Lo mas grave es el proceder de la traidora Park Geun-hye que se adhiere al frente a la estrategia de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					La camarilla de Park, que se desespera por acarrear a los connacionales los desastres nucleares que sufrio el pueblo japones en el siglo pasado, es la horda de peores traidores a la nacion y sirvientes de la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Debido a tales maniacos de guerra nuclear, la nacion coreana ha venido viviendo durante varios decenios en el peligro de la guerra nuclear y se ven amenazadas gravemente la paz y la estabilidad de la region. 
					
					Mientras existan los maniacos de guerra nuclear como los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos, no podran pensar en el alivio de la tension y el aseguramiento de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region, ni en la paz del mundo. 
					
					Todos los coreanos deben levantarse con mas dinamismo en la sagrada lucha por frustrar los imprudentes alborotos de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos. Y, al mismo tiempo, la sociedad internacional debe elevar la vigilancia sobre las maniobras fraudulentas de los maniacos de guerra nuclear. 
					
					La RPDC consolidara constantemente el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa, remedio todopoderoso para la defensa de la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
